definition: a mortgage (loanword via Cantonese)/to buy property on a mortgage
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to take the lid off/to expose/to unmask

sentences.english: Tell your friends and relatives about Excellent's free mortgage referral and consulting services.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你的親友們有關卓譽的免費按揭轉介及諮詢服務。

sentences.english: Or find out that you're six months behind on your mortgage payment?
sentences.chinese: 或者發現你的按揭付款已經超期六個月了？

sentences.english: Reinstatement cost of the building or mortgaged loan amount required by the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 樓宇建築之重建費或銀行指定之按揭金額。

sentences.english: Also, the developer will offer another ten percent mortgage to purchasers.
sentences.chinese: 開發商可提供一成的按揭給認購者。

sentences.english: Some homeowners are delinquent, or unable to make the payments on costly, exotic mortgages they took out during the boom.
sentences.chinese: 一些屋主拖欠債務，或者無力支付高額的按揭款。

sentences.english: When you remortgage you are ending your old mortgage deal and switching to a new one.
sentences.chinese: 當你結束你的老轉你轉按揭交易和新車。

sentences.english: They have little motivation to refinance commercial real-estate loans.
sentences.chinese: 它們沒有多少動力對商業房地產貸款進行轉按揭。

sentences.english: Finally, it discusses the validity of Louhua mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 最後，討論了樓花按揭的效力問題。

sentences.english: You would choose a remortgage because it allows you to change your mortgage without moving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你會選擇，因爲它允許你轉按揭動你改變你的家。

sentences.english: It is understood that this was the first domestic - type housing mortgage finance varieties.
sentences.chinese: 據瞭解，這是國內首個理財型住房按揭品種。

sentences.english: I make people happy all day with foreclosures.
sentences.chinese: 我成天都在取消按揭回贖權，這讓人們很高興。

sentences.english: Now I am saving thousands with my new refinanced mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 現在我與我的新轉按揭節省數千。

sentences.english: The mortgage guarantee insurance of housing has been in dispute since it was adopted in China.
sentences.chinese: 住房按揭保證保險是一項備受爭議的險種。

sentences.english: The meaning and legal characteristics of mortgage; purchasing house by means of mortgage is guaranteed by hypothec of the target house.
sentences.chinese: 按揭購房是以房屋本身設立抵押權爲保證的。

sentences.english: First , for pre - sale mortgage real estate mortgage and real estate.
sentences.chinese: 第一，對於預售商品房按揭與不動產抵押。

sentences.english: Using mortgage purchases at the highest price, it is also our wage- earners .
sentences.chinese: 用按揭在最高價買房的，也恰恰正是我們的工薪階層。

definition: a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to buy a house on a mortgage/house mortgage
forward delivery apartment/unfinished housing to be paid for in advance by the buyer and then completed within certain time frame
to pay in installments/payment in installments
to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
